query:
SELECT
                COUNT(r.user_id) AS count,
                COALESCE(SUM(
                    CASE WHEN EXISTS (
                        SELECT 1
                        FROM emails e
                        WHERE e.kind = ?
                          AND e.user_id = r.user_id
                          AND e.event_id = rs.event_id
                          AND e.sent_at IS NOT NULL
                    )
                    THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
                ), 0) AS sent
            FROM rsvps r
            JOIN rsvp_sessions rs ON rs.id = r.session_id
            WHERE rs.event_id = ?
                AND (rs.status = ? OR rs.status = ?)
